mapper.insert:
insert into daily ( project_id, project_name, post_code, post_name, content, create_by, create_date ) values
( #{item.projectId}, #{item.projectName}, #{item.postCode}, #{item.postName}, #{item.content}, #{item.createBy}, #{item.createDate} )
mapper.select: select DISTINCT DATE_FORMAT(create_date,"%Y-%m-%d") as `date` from daily order by DATE_FORMAT(create_date,"%Y-%m-%d") desc
